languages.text: Арена Комморры пала, сотрясаясь от повторной дизъюнкции. Возможно, если бы друкари знали, к чему приведет появление в Прорве ничтожного мон-кай, они бы тщательнее позаботились о {mf|его|ее} убийстве.

traits.locale_text: Арена Комморры пала, сотрясаясь от повторной Дизъюнкции. Возможно, если бы друкари знали, к чему приведет появление в Прорве ничтожного мон-кай, они бы тщательнее позаботились о {mf|его|ее} убийстве.

languages.text: The arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst has fallen, torn apart by the new dysjunction. If the Drukhari had known that a pitiful mon-keigh's arrival in the Chasm would cause its downfall, they may have taken better care to ensure {mf|he|she} was dead.
languages.original_text: Арена Комморры пала, сотрясаясь от повторной дизъюнкции. Возможно, если бы друкари знали, к чему приведет появление в Прорве ничтожного мон-кай, они бы тщательнее позаботились о {mf|его|ее} убийстве.

traits.locale_text: The arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst has fallen, torn apart by the new Dysjunction. If Drukhari knew that a pitiful mon-keigh that appeared in the Chasm would cause its downfall, they might've taken better care making sure {mf|he|she} was dead.

The arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst has fallen, torn apart by the new dysjunction. If the Drukhari had known that a pitiful mon-keigh's arrival in the Chasm would cause its downfall, they may have taken better care to ensure {mf|he|she} was dead.

The arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst has fallen, torn apart by the new dysjunction. If the Drukhari had known that a pitiful mon-keigh's arrival in the Chasm would cause its downfall, they may have taken better care to ensure {mf|he|she} was dead.

languages.text: L'arène du Culte de la Soif Fatale a été ravagée par la nouvelle disjonction. Si les Drukharis avaient su que l'arrivée dans l'Abîme d'{mf|un|une} pitoyable mon-keigh les mènerait à leur perte, ils auraient probablement veillé à {mf|le|la} tuer.
languages.original_text: The arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst has fallen, torn apart by the new dysjunction. If the Drukhari had known that a pitiful mon-keigh's arrival in the Chasm would cause its downfall, they may have taken better care to ensure {mf|he|she} was dead.

traits.locale_text: L'arène du Culte de la Soif Fatale a été ravagée par la nouvelle disjonction. Si les Drukharis avaient su que l'arrivée dans l'Abîme d'{mf|un|une} pitoyable mon-keigh les mènerait à leur perte, ils auraient probablement veillé à {mf|le|la} tuer.

languages.text: “致命饥渴”教派的竞技场已经坍塌，被新的动荡撕成了碎片。倘若那些黑暗灵族能提前得知，区区一只不起眼的猴子竟然会让整座竞技场毁于一旦，他们肯定会采取更加万全的手段，确保{mf|他|她}死无葬身之地。
languages.original_text: The arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst has fallen, torn apart by the new dysjunction. If the Drukhari had known that a pitiful mon-keigh's arrival in the Chasm would cause its downfall, they may have taken better care to ensure {mf|he|she} was dead.

traits.locale_text: “致命饥渴”教派的竞技场已经坍塌，被新的动荡撕成了碎片。倘若那些黑暗灵族能提前得知，区区一只不起眼的猴子竟然会让整座竞技场毁于一旦，他们肯定会采取更加万全的手段，确保{mf|他|她}死无葬身之地。

languages.text: 「宿命の渇き」教団の闘技場は、新たな分裂により分断されて陥落した。哀れなモン＝ケイが裂け目に到達することで自分の破滅が引き起こされることをデュカーリが知っていたなら、確実に死を迎えられるよう、細心の注意を払ったかもしれない。
languages.original_text: The arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst has fallen, torn apart by the new dysjunction. If the Drukhari had known that a pitiful mon-keigh's arrival in the Chasm would cause its downfall, they may have taken better care to ensure {mf|he|she} was dead.

traits.locale_text: 「宿命の渇き」教団の闘技場は、新たな分裂により分断されて陥落した。哀れなモン＝ケイが裂け目に到達することで自分の破滅が引き起こされることをデュカーリが知っていたなら、確実に死を迎えられるよう、細心の注意を払ったかもしれない。

languages.text: Die Arena des Kults des Fatalen Dursts ist gefallen, von der neuen Disjunktion zerrissen. Hätten die Drukhari gewusst, dass die Ankunft eines jämmerlichen Chem-Pan-Sey in der Kluft ihren Niedergang auslösen würde, hätten sie vielleicht sichergestellt, dass {mf|er|sie} tot ist.
languages.original_text: The arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst has fallen, torn apart by the new dysjunction. If the Drukhari had known that a pitiful mon-keigh's arrival in the Chasm would cause its downfall, they may have taken better care to ensure {mf|he|she} was dead.

traits.locale_text: Die Arena des Kults des Fatalen Dursts ist gefallen, von der neuen Disjunktion zerrissen. Hätten die Drukhari gewusst, dass die Ankunft eines jämmerlichen Chem-Pan-Sey in der Kluft ihren Niedergang auslösen würde, hätten sie vielleicht sichergestellt, dass {mf|er|sie} tot ist.

languages.text: La arena del Culto de la Sed Letal ha caído, despedazada por la nueva disyunción. Si los Drukhari hubieran sabido que la llegada de un{mf||a} insignificante mon-keigh al Abismo causaría su caída, probablemente hubieran hecho más para asegurarse de que moría.
languages.original_text: The arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst has fallen, torn apart by the new dysjunction. If the Drukhari had known that a pitiful mon-keigh's arrival in the Chasm would cause its downfall, they may have taken better care to ensure {mf|he|she} was dead.

traits.locale_text: La arena del Culto de la Sed Letal ha caído, despedazada por la nueva disyunción. Si los Drukhari hubieran sabido que la llegada de un{mf||a} insignificante mon-keigh al Abismo causaría su caída, probablemente hubieran hecho más para asegurarse de que moría.

languages.text: Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'nın arenası, yeni ayrışım tarafından yok edildi. Drukhariler, acınası bir mon-keigh'in Yarık'a gelişiyle yok olacaklarını bilseydi onun öldüğünden emin olmak için daha büyük bir çaba harcardı.
languages.original_text: The arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst has fallen, torn apart by the new dysjunction. If the Drukhari had known that a pitiful mon-keigh's arrival in the Chasm would cause its downfall, they may have taken better care to ensure {mf|he|she} was dead.
